unnormalised: Hey everyone, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Hope he's recovering well for the upcoming series. Remember how crucial he was in the last match at Wankhede? This is more suspenseful than watching a Karan Johar film! Any word from the BCCI or Kokilaben Hospital? Praying for a speedy recovery, maybe 2-3 weeks max! Need him back to bowl those 140 kmph deliveries soon!
normalised: Hey everyone, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Hope he's recovering well for the upcoming series. Remember how crucial he was in the last match at Wankhede? This is more suspenseful than watching a Karan Johar film! Any word from the B C C I or Kokilaben Hospital? Praying for a speedy recovery, maybe two to three weeks max!
